attributes.description:
Service Plan up to 30 April 2024 or 45 000Km.
Warranty up to 30 April 2024 or 120 000Km.
Out on the open road, the Volkswagen Polo 1.0 TSI is so quiet and refined it feels like a bigger and more sophisticated package than what the price suggests. 

It rides comfortably too and there’s really no faulting the road holding. The steering feels accurate and intuitive. Overall, the Polo exhibits a solid and planted feel on the road.

We offer nationwide delivery, wherever you may be in South Africa, we have you covered.

T&C’s apply
e&oe.

Fog lamps,
Front and rear PDCs,
17'inch alloy wheels,

Adjustable steering wheel,
Multi-function steering wheel,

USB port,
Bluetooth,
Touch screen infotainment,
Air conditioning,
Airbags,
ISOFIX,
Center armrest,
